highlights.list: Creating pixel-perfect courses from Figma designs using HTML, CSS, and Javascript for BlackBoard
Creating a sustainable course development process with current resources in the team to increase productivity, course output frequency, and quality
Reorganization and improvements to the Innovative Learning WordPress site
